thread.title: A little dated but location Spectacular
thread.title_full: A little dated but location Spectacular - Review of Park Lane Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: EKWhouston
title: A little dated but location Spectacular
text:
Stayed here in February
The hotel is a little dated The bathrooms are very small. The beds are comfortable and the location cannot be beat. We had a view of Central Park So much fu.
Walk out the door turn right and the subway if right there. Plaza 50 yards away
Location Location Location
Room Tip: View of Central Park See more room tips
